desc: Utah Smoke Bombs carries 60 second smoke bombs in 9 colors for photography, videography and more. Used in wedding, engagement, graduation, gender reveal and sports pictures, these smoke effects add a colorful and unique background. Local in Utah with 24/7 pick up in Saratoga Springs (near Orem and Salt Lake City)

layout.text: Utah's #1 Smoke Effect Company. 24/7 pick up in Saratoga Springs, UT. High quality, low prices-GUARANTEED
